name: 曾恕銘
objective: 本課程介紹無線傳輸技術的基礎和最新發展，內容包含行動通訊基礎(cellular system, propagation model, diversity), 無碰撞的多重存取CDMA，OFDMA，MIMO(spatial multiplexing/spatial transmit diversity/bemaforming)，排隊理論，偵測與估計， 4G MIMO傳輸模式/5G願景，競爭型的多重存取協定(WiFi的CSMA/CA，乙太網路的CSMA/CD)。
schedule:
1.　　Background review (RP/RV, digital commun., linear algebra)
2.　　Mobile communication fundamentals (cellular system, propagation model, diversity)
3.　　CDMA fundamental
4.　　Data Detection/Interference Cancellation for CDMA etc.
5.　　MIMO(spatial multiplexing/spatial transmit diversity/bemaforming/MU-MIMO) and 4G transmission modes (new)
6.　　OFDM(A) principle synchronization channel estimation (new)
7.　　Traffic Theories (Poisson arrivals, 排隊理論)
8.  Estimation hypothesis testing  linear regression Kalman filter (偵測與估計)
9.　　4G Overview, MIMO Modes, Link Adaption, and 5G Vision (new)
10. contention-based multiple access protocols in MAC layer(WiFi的CSMA/CA，乙太網路的CSMA/CD) (optional)(new)
scorePolicy:
Oral report 1 (part of handouts): 20%
Midterm Exam: 50% 
Oral report  2 (a paper about 4G/5G transmission technology: OFDMA, MIMO,MU-MIMO, MIMO precoding, open-loop/close-loop spatial multiplexing/spatial diversity, D2D communications, Cooperation/relaying communication): 30%
materials:
Textbooks:
None
